params.amount: The amount of tokens being received
params.originAndNonce: Domain where the transfer originated and the unique identifier for the message from origin to destination, combined in a single field ((origin << 32) & nonce)
params.recipient: The address receiving the tokens; the original recipient of the transfer
params.token: The address of the local token contract being received

params.toDomain: the domain of the chain the tokens are being sent to
params.toId: the bytes32 address of the recipient of the tokens
params.token: the address of the token contract

params._domain: The domain of the remote xApp Router
params._router: The address of the remote xApp Router

params._nonce: The unique identifier for the message from origin to destination

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: should be impossible to renounce ownership;      we override OpenZeppelin OwnableUpgradeable's      implementation of renounceOwnership to make it a no-op

params._extraData: Extra data that will be passed to the hook for        execution
params._remoteHook: The hook contract on the remote chain

params._xAppConnectionManager: The address of the xAppConnectionManager contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

Receive(uint64,address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when tokens are dispensed to an account on this domain emitted when the transfer ultimately settles

Send(address,address,uint32,bytes32,uint.notice: emitted when tokens are sent from this domain to another domain

enrollRemoteRouter(uint32,bytes32).notice: Register the address of a Router contract for the same xApp on a remote chain

send(address,uint256,uint32,bytes32).notice: Send tokens to a recipient on a remote chain

sendToHook(address,uint256,uint32,bytes3.notice: Send tokens to a hook on the remote chain

setXAppConnectionManager(address).notice: Modify the contract the xApp uses to validate Replica contracts
